Introduction: ...!#$b#A person...? Hehe... Hello...$h#$b#The clock goes tick tick tick...$h
Mon: Today is Monday! Today is Monday! Monday string beans!$h#$b#All you hungry children come and eat *him* up.$h
Mon2: Heads and shoulders, knees and his head is gone!$u
Mon4: Twinkle twinkle little star... how I wonder what you are...#$b#Up above the world so high, Grant my wish and let me die...$h
Mon6: I want to see the stars... stars that shine bright in the dark...
Mon8: I heard the birds sing today morning... It was quite lively.$l
Tue: My hands dyed in blood... he died in blood...
Tue2: I cleaned and got myself ready... What did I do wrong? Where is he? Where is he?$u
Tue4: The rabbit was the witch. The rabbit was the witch.#$b#I chased down the rabbit, oh, I was desperate.
Tue6: I wonder what is happening outside of this cursed place...?
Tue8: @... You are the light in the darkness.#$b#That is who you are to me.$l
Wed: 8:40... tick tock... 8:40... tick tock... 8:40... tick tock...$h
Wed2: Heheheheheheh. What flavor should I choose for my wedding cake?$h#$b#...!$u#$b#What are you doing here?$a
Wed4: Nightmares hunt me down every single night...$u
Wed6: I feel dead... inside and out...#$b#I want to *live* for once!$h
Wed8: @, why do you come visit a miserable creature like myself?
Thu: Say hello to my handsome fiance!$h#$b#...? Hey! Why aren't you greeting him!$a
Thu2: You look familar, hehe... Have we met?$h
Thu4: %Abandoned Bride is staring at you. You wonder if she is smiling or crying.
Thu6: How long have I been locked up here...? I don't know...
Fri: He screamed at me... He tried to... k... me... I...$u
Fri2: My mom... she...$s#$b#It's all because of me...$s
Fri4: Why can't I just have a better life...?
Fri6: Do you think I still have chance to turn my life around...?
Fri8: I want to start a... new chapter of my life...$h
Sat: Run away, run away... run away... from me...$h
Sat2: Don't come near me! No! Leave me alone!$a
Sat4: You are not running away from me...yet... How so...?
Sat6: Why are you here, @? This is a bad place to be... You should leave...
Sat8: You... are special to me...$l#$b#Sorry, I... didn't mean to... No, don't freak out. Please...
Sun: %Abandoned Bride looks frightened to see you.
Sun2: No, don't hurt me. Don't hurt me... I am sorry...$s
Sun4: You are not going to hurt me...?#$b#Liar! Get out of my face!$a
Sun6: I... I am thinking to... change. It was only possible because of you...
Sun8: I have been quite busy these days... It has been a while since I have been working on a project.$h
reject_two_heartA: No, no, no, no, no, no, no...$u
reject_four_heartA: I am hurt, can't you tell? I am hurt! Leave me alone!$u
reject_four_heartB: No, No! I can't! I can't! You will hurt me and leave me for good!$u
engageA: Heheheh. I will come after you! You betrayed me! You are engaged!$h
engageB: You are cra-zy, cra-zy like me! You are engaged!$h
marriedA: I hate monsters like you! You are married! How could you do this?$a
marriedB: You are a monster! A monster! Unforgivable!$u
refusal_knownA: Please don't do this to me... You know I am not ready for this.$s
refusal_knownB: Please don't do this to me... You know I am not ready for this.$s
event_trauma3: You are a monster... A moster just like him!$7
event_lonely1: I... I am sorry! I know I am not worthy of you!$s
event_lonely2: %Abandoned Bride's eyes grew bigger. She stares at you in awe.
event_lonely4: What do you mean? What else would I be?$h
event_forgive1: How could you say that! No! Don't you dare say that!$a
event_story2: Wow, @. That was pretty straightforward. I, I apologize.$10
